title: Involvement Fair
description: Meet PSA at the Involvement Fair — learn about our events, sign up, and say hi!

title: Chaa & Gupshup
description: First meetup of the semester — sip chai, hang out, and connect with the PSA community.

title: Punjabi Calligraphy
location: North District - Houston Stripe Art Studio
description: Learn the beautiful art of Punjabi calligraphy! We'll provide pens and paper for this cultural workshop.

title: Spooky Samosa Night
description: Halloween meets Punjabi culture! Join us for samosas, plates, pumpkins, and utensils to carve pumpkins in a fun, spooky atmosphere.

title: Diwali Celebration
description: Celebrate the Festival of Lights with us! Enjoy delicious veg biryani and chicken biryani, served with bowls, napkins, and spoons.

title: Game Night
description: Fun game night with sprite, syrups, cups, cherries, and straws! Come play games and enjoy refreshing drinks with the PSA community.

title: Punjabi Musical Night
description: End the semester with a musical celebration! Experience the rich sounds and rhythms of Punjabi music in an evening of cultural entertainment.
